00012 //    Fixed is_pointer, is_reference, is_const, is_volatile, is_same, 
00013 //    is_member_pointer based on the Simulated Partial Specialization work 
00014 //    of Mat Marcus and Jesse Jones. See  http://opensource.adobe.com or 
00015 //    http://groups.yahoo.com/group/boost/message/5441 
00016 //    Some workarounds in here use ideas suggested from "Generic<Programming>: 
00017 //    Mappings between Types and Values" 
00018 //    by Andrei Alexandrescu (see http://www.cuj.com/experts/1810/alexandr.html).

00020 
00021 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_VOLATILE_HPP_INCLUDED
00022 #define BOOST_TT_IS_VOLATILE_HPP_INCLUDED
00023 
00024 #include "boost/config.hpp"
00025 
00026 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00027 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/cv_traits_impl.hpp"
00028 #else
00029 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_reference.hpp"
00030 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_array.hpp"
00031 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/yes_no_type.hpp"
00032 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/false_result.hpp"
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 // should be the last #include
00036 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace boost {
00039 
00040 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00041 
00042 //* is a type T declared volatile - is_volatile<T>
00043 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_volatile,T,::boost::detail::cv_traits_imp<T*>::is_volatile)
00044 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_volatile,T&,false)
00045 
00046 #if defined(__BORLANDC__) && (__BORLANDC__ < 0x600)
00047 // these are illegal specialisations; cv-qualifies applied to
00048 // references have no effect according to [8.3.2p1],
00049 // C++ Builder requires them though as it treats cv-qualified
00050 // references as distinct types...
00051 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_volatile,T& const,false)
00052 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_volatile,T& volatile,false)
00053 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_volatile,T& const volatile,false)
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 #else
00057 
00058 namespace detail {
00059 
00060 using ::boost::type_traits::yes_type;
00061 using ::boost::type_traits::no_type;
00062 
00063 yes_type is_volatile_tester(void const volatile*);
00064 no_type is_volatile_tester(void const*);
00065 
00066 template <bool is_ref, bool array>
00067 struct is_volatile_helper
00068     : ::boost::type_traits::false_result
00069 {
00070 };
00071 
00072 template <>
00073 struct is_volatile_helper<false,false>
00074 {
00075     template <typename T> struct result_
00076     {
00077         static T* t;
00078         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = (
00079             sizeof(detail::yes_type) == sizeof(detail::is_volatile_tester(t))
00080             ));
00081     };
00082 };
00083 
00084 template <>
00085 struct is_volatile_helper<false,true>
00086 {
00087     template <typename T> struct result_
00088     {
00089         static T t;
00090         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = (
00091             sizeof(detail::yes_type) == sizeof(detail::is_volatile_tester(&t))
00092             ));
00093     };
00094 };
00095 
00096 template <typename T>
00097 struct is_volatile_impl
00098     : is_volatile_helper<
00099           is_reference<T>::value
00100         , is_array<T>::value
00101         >::template result_<T>
00102 {
00103 };
00104 
00105 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_volatile,void,false)
00106 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CV_VOID_SPECIALIZATIONS
00107 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_volatile,void const,false)
00108 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_volatile,void volatile,true)
00109 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_volatile,void const volatile,true)
00110 #endif
00111 
00112 } // namespace detail
00113 
00114 //* is a type T declared volatile - is_volatile<T>
00115 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_volatile,T,::boost::detail::is_volatile_impl<T>::value)
00116 
00117 #endif // BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00118 
00119 } // namespace boost
00120 
00121 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_undef.hpp"
00122 
00123 #endif // BOOST_TT_IS_VOLATILE_HPP_INCLUDED
